vote.title: Reappointment of Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee  (Sup Res 003-21/22)
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the reappointment of Ms. Margaret Fuentes, LAUSD parent representative of a child enrolled in the District (Section 3.1.4 of MOU), as member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee, for a two-year term commencing September 4, 2021 and determines that Ms. Fuentes is not an employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
